articles.title: Jerry Lee Lewis Was a Rock & Roll Titan. That Doesn’t Justify What He Did Offstage - Rolling Stone
articles.description: The singer lived out rock's audacity in extreme fashion, making him one of the defining performers of his era. He also did terrible things, over and over
articles.content: Jerry Lee Lewis was rock & roll’s original prodigal son. When he burned brightly, in the mid-to-late 1950s, he was untouchable. Then, when he fell from grace, he was untouchable in a different wa… [+24174 chars]
